Assignment#5

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
# Load the dataset
data(iris)

# Create a histogram of the Sepal Length
hist(iris$Sepal.Length, 
     main = "Histogram of Sepal Length",
     xlab = "Sepal Length",
     ylab = "Frequency",
     col = "orange",
     border = "black")
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
# Sample data
categories <- c("Category A", "Category B", "Category C", "Category D")
values <- c(25, 40, 30, 15)

# Create a vertical bar chart
barplot(values, names.arg = categories,
        main = "Vertical Bar Chart",
        xlab = "Categories",
        ylab = "Values",
        col = "lightblue")
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
# Create a horizontal bar chart
barplot(values, names.arg = categories,
        main = "Horizontal Bar Chart",
        xlab = "Values",
        ylab = "Categories",
        col = "lightgreen",
        horiz = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
# Create a pie chart
pie(values, labels = categories,
    main = "Pie Chart",
    col = rainbow(length(categories)))  # Use 'rainbow' for different colors

```


Using ggplot

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
# library
library(ggplot2)
#creates a histogram in R
ggplot(data=iris, aes(Sepal.Length)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.5,color="black", fill="orange") + labs(x="Sepal Length", y="Frequency", title = "Sepal Length Distribution") + 
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
#example 2: Barplot using geom_bar()
#Vertical
ggplot(iris, aes(x = as.factor(Species), fill = as.factor(Species))) + 
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("orange", "green", "blue")) +
  labs(x = "Species", y = "Frequency", title = "Vertical Bar") +
  theme_classic()
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
#Horizontal  
ggplot(iris, aes(x = as.factor(Species), fill = as.factor(Species))) + 
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("orange", "green", "blue")) +
  labs(x = "Species", y = "Frequency", title = "Horizontal Bar") +
  theme_classic() +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "Show Hidden Code"
ggplot(iris, aes(x=Species, y=Sepal.Length, fill=Species)) + 
  geom_boxplot()+
  labs(title="Plot of Sepal Length  per Iris Species (Boxplot)", x="Iris Species", y = "Sepal Length (cm)") +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("orange", "green", "blue")) +
  theme_classic()
```
